text:
London | Full-time | Software engineers and data scientists.

We're a young, new, and investor-backed data-mining startup. We provide fast and accurate analysis of documents related to real estate investments. We're currently four people, and recruiting experienced engineers to help build out our MVP.

We are agnostic about which technologies you prefer, we're chiefly interested in your capacity to learn and your experience shipping software in the past.

Contact myself (in profile) or Peter Bredthauer and Charlie Williams (pbredthauer@triviumre.com, cwilliams@triviumre.com).
